item.title: python sort
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- import random def get_random_list(num): t = [] for i in range(0, num): t.append(random.randint(0, 200)) return t def bubble_sort(t): '''从小到大''' passnum = len(t) - 1 exchanges = True while passnum >
